title: Which algorithms run in reasonable time

content.description: A computer scientist is analyzing four different algorithms used to sort a list. The table below shows the number of steps each algorithm took to sort lists of different sizes.
content.question: List Size Number of Steps for Algorithm A Number of Steps for Algorithm B Number of Steps for Algorithm C Number of Steps for Algorithm D 1 10 2 1 1 2 20 4 2 4 3 30 8 6 9 4 40 16 24 16 5 50 32 120 25 Based on the values in the table, which of the algorithms appear to run in reasonable time? Select two answers.
